atlantic.title: The House That Jon Stewart Built
atlantic.topComment: "The 2008 election deprived Stewart of his greatest target" Good Lord, this is a weak thesis. Washington is still -- and always will be -- a target-rich environment. His audience can laugh at absurd officials whose names they don't know quite as easi...

atlantic.title: The Governor Who (Maybe) Tried to Kill Liberal-Arts Education
atlantic.topComment: I just want to say this to all the people who want to denigrate an education in the arts. My husband and I have a small manufacturing business -- we design, manufacture and market auto parts for the performance market. He designs, I market. He has a ...

atlantic.title: The Food Babe: Enemy of Chemicals
atlantic.topComment: So she says, if you're quoting accurately, "There is just no acceptable level of any chemical to ingest, ever." Then we have no choice but to starve -- for everything is a chemical, by definition. Anyone who would say such a thing is an idiot; the fa...
